channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 5-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and father return to Minnesota from ICE facility in Texas
item.description: Five-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and his father have returned to Minnesota after being released by U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement

item.title: Punxsutawney Phil is said to have seen his shadow, forecasting 6 more weeks of winter
item.description: Punxsutawney Phil’s handlers say he’s seen his shadow and is therefore predicting six more weeks of winter weather

item.title: Wall Street opens higher while gold and silver claw back losses
item.description: Wild swings that swept through financial markets overnight are calming a bit as Wall Street opens for trading

item.title: Kennedy Center to close for 2 years for renovations in July, Trump says, after performers' backlash
item.description: President Donald Trump says he will move to close Washington’s Kennedy Center performing arts venue for two years starting in July for construction

item.title: Speaker Johnson faces tough choices on partial government shutdown and debate over ICE
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson faces tough days ahead trying to pass a federal funding package and prevent a prolonged partial government shutdown
